Update Manager API: GtkCommon Frontend module¶

Common Gtk functionality

Submodules¶

  • Update Manager API: SimpleGtkbuilderApp module

Functions¶

UpdateManager.Frontend.GtkCommon.get_ui_path(ui_filename)¶

Returns path to an UI file.

Parameter:ui_filename – UI file name.
UpdateManager.Frontend.GtkCommon.get_desktop_path(desktop_filename)¶

Returns path to a desktop file.

Parameter:desktop_filename – Desktop file name

Constants & Data¶

UpdateManager.Frontend.GtkCommon.DATA_DIR¶
Data directory (/usr/share/update-manager/)
UpdateManager.Frontend.GtkCommon.DESKTOP_DIR¶
Desktop file directory (/usr/share/applications/)
UpdateManager.Frontend.GtkCommon.THIS_PATH¶
Absolute path to the directory containing this file
UpdateManager.Frontend.GtkCommon.DEVEL_DATA_DIR¶
Absolute path to development data (THIS_PATH/../../../data/)
